text: @SpeakerPelosi @SpeakerPelosi, QUIT the CHINESE CORONAVIRUS FEAR-MONGERING by YOU & your CONGLOMERATE COMMUNIST Party, NO MORE STIMULUS HANDOUTS, PUT AMERICAN CITIZENS back to WORK, WE WILL TAKE CARE of the REST & GROW this ECONOMY,  ONLY President Trump & WE THE PEOPLE KNOW HOW  ... BUTT OUT.
